title: Fort Scott National Historic Site: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions              Current Conditions          Alerts    No alerts at this time     Â    All of the eleven buildings that are open to the public are open today.. One of the infantry barracks, which houses a museum and the site's ranger offices has recently been  remodeled. Now open are a new theater where the site plays its 23 minute movie, accessible restrooms, and new interactive Civil War.Bleeding Kansas exhibits.
